com.enterprise_architecture.essential.importutility.utils
Class EssentialServletContext

java.lang.Object
  com.enterprise_architecture.essential.importutility.utils.EssentialServletContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.ServletContext
public class EssentialServletContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.ServletContext

Class to manage the calls to #getRealPath() method to handle incorrect calls.

Author:
Jonathan Carter

          The actual servlet context that is being intercepted

getRealPath

public java.lang.String getRealPath(java.lang.String theRelativePath)
Intercept call to ensure that the relative path supplied is correctly formatted. An empty or null string will be replaced by '/'. Any relative path supplied that does not start with '/' has the '/' added to the start of the path.

Specified by:
getRealPath in interface javax.servlet.ServletContext
Parameters:
theRelativePath - the relative path to the element for which the full path (real path) is being requested.
